concept.title: 28.305 Overseas workers’ compensation and war–hazard insurance.

conbody.p: (d) Instructions for waiver of Defense Base Act requirements can be accessed at Waivers for Defense Base Act (DBA) Insurance (https://www.acq.osd.mil/dpap/cpic/cp/waivers_for_defense_base_act_insurance.html).Requests for waiver must be made in writing using Form BEC 565, Request for Waiver – Defense Base Act (https://www.acq.osd.mil/dpap/cpic/cp/docs/DBA_Waiver_Form.pdf). Prepare requests in accordance with DFARS PGI 228.305(d) in coordination with Office of Counsel. Submit request for waiver to the DLA Acquisition.Compliance, Policy and Pricing Division for signature by the DLA Acquisition Director. The DLA Acquisition Compliance, Policy and Pricing Division will submit the request to the Department of Labor.
